judges: Before. Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The judgment is affirmed on the thorough and well considered opinion of Judge Nixon for the court below reported in 14 Pa. D. & C. 2d 499.
Judgment affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: John David. Rhodes, with him Pringle, Bredin & Martin, for appellant.
H. Stewart Dunn, Assistant City Solicitor, - with drim J. Frank McKenna, Jr., City Solicitor, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Pittsburgh v. Pennsylvania Railroad, Appellant.
Argued September 29, 1958.
Before. Jones, C. J., Bell, Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
John David. Rhodes, with him Pringle, Bredin & Martin, for appellant.
H. Stewart Dunn, Assistant City Solicitor, - with drim J. Frank McKenna, Jr., City Solicitor, for appellee.
November 10, 1958:
